io.oddworks.device.request

Class AuthenticationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.oddworks.device.request.AuthenticationService

  • public class AuthenticationService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for retrieving and storing authentication tokens. Is instantiated using the ReqeustServicesInitializer and afterward can be accessed through the instance field
